name: Blob - Explorer - select folder - right click - new SQL script - select top 100 rows

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://bdbjblobstorageqingtest.blob.core.windows.net/container02/New folder 1129/New folder 112902/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
